info.description:
### Intro

Follow along with this GitHub: **[https://github.com/c3drive/my_tools/tree/main/newman]()**.

* The [Echo CRUD API Documentaion](https://github.com/c3drive/my_web_scraping/tree/main/api_server/go-rest-api)
